bug.author: robertnishihara
bug.description:
I can't reproduce it reliably, but occasionally I can cause testInheritActorFromClass in actor_test.py to fail by running the following. <denchmark-code>for i in {1..500}; do python test/actor_test.py ActorInheritance.testInheritActorFromClass; done </denchmark-code>
I have seen it fail with a check failure in line 504 in local_scheduler.cc, which is <denchmark-code>CHECK(ActorID_equal(TaskSpec_actor_id(spec), NIL_ACTOR_ID)); </denchmark-code>
Object reconstruction should be suppressed before it gets to this point. In this particular test, no objects should be evicted and no processes should be failing. It is a little unclear what is happening here.
